p: In 2018, by using a new, highly-sensitive and cell-independent receptor discovery platform, the cellular receptor for PC in epithelial cells/endothelial cells was finally identified as neuropilin2 (Nrp2), while PDGFRÎ± was re-confirmed as an HCMV cellular receptor in fibroblasts [ 72]. A previous study observed the activation of the ErbB family member by the PC, but did not detect direct binding between the PC and ErbB receptors [ 68]. Thus, ErbB activation could be a consequence of the Nrp2 pathway activation upon direct engagement with the PC [ 72].
